segments.text: I am absolutely disgusted by the state of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just relentlessly pouring over the edge and onto everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet fronts are getting soaked, and there's a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman possibly be so unaware of this mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right there, with her foot in the water, completely calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression while a flood occurs is infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause serious water damage to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sheer negligence that such an obvious problem is ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to reach in and just turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the peaceful garden outside makes it even more frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a lack of attention to immediate surroundings is baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This overflowing sink is an avoidable disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
